bibl.title: Critical Notes on Graeco-Roman Ostraca.
bibl.note: 1. "Samion", a wine measure. O. Mich. I, 249. - 2. A receipt for "eikoste". O. Mich. I, 133. - 3. The price of wheat in 276 A.D. O. Mich. I, 157. - 4. "Ibion Argaiou". O. Mich. I, 367. - 5. A rate of taxation at Tali. O. Mich. I, 163. - 6. A bilingual memorandum. O. Mich. I, 666. - 7. "ekbsou". O. Mich. I, 655. - 8. "lagon". O. Mich. I, 336.
Youtie Herbert C., Critical Notes on Graeco-Roman Ostraca.
